scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix ai-auto-qa && npm install --prefix ai-auto-qa/server
scripts.dev:qa: concurrently "npm --prefix ai-auto-qa/server run dev" "npm --prefix ai-auto-qa run dev"
scripts.start:qa: concurrently "npm --prefix ai-auto-qa/server start" "npm --prefix ai-auto-qa run dev"
